thread.section_title: Powermeter24 Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Powermeter24 | www.powermeter24.com
thread.title: Vladimir Gnedovskii

author: Vladimir Gnedovskii
title: Vladimir Gnedovskii
text: Ordered Stages powermeter from the shop. Made payment, got email promissing tracking of my package. But didn't get it. After couple of emails and a phone call, I got it. Delivery was quick (less 2 weeks to Spb, Russia). Package and device itself is just perfect. Minus 1 star for this delivery issue (which might be Dhl issue actually). Recommend this shop.
